channel.title: Raspberrypi on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberrypi on PR

item.title: My Raspberry Pi Collection
item.description: I’ve always been interested in Raspberry Pi. I pre-ordered, waited for about 3+ months and even paid Customs (ridiculous amount) to import my very first Pi.

item.title: Raspbian + XBMC + Airplay
item.description: TL;DR: Yes, you can. If you are only interested in the steps skip to the relevant section. I own a Raspberry Pi for closer to a year now.

item.title: IdeaVault - RPi dashboard
item.description: I couldn’t help myself after listening to John & Marco discussion about the pricing of Panic’s new app Status Board.
